Name: Sphere Game
About the game: Sphere game is a 3D platform game where the player must show skills to control a slightly heavy sphere overcoming obstacles to pass the level. FEATURES: Realistic physics 15 levels 3 different difficulties: easy,hard,impossible HDR Beautiful graphics
